pr_title: MINOR: Add synchronization to the protocol name check

timeline.message: Add synchronization to the protocol name check

timeline.bodyText: @dajac just to clarify, are you concerning that the generation() may change between the check and the error-log? If yes maybe we do not need to synchronize the whole function, instead we just get a reference of the returned generation() call and use that in the error-log, since the generation object is immutable.
timeline.author: guozhangwang
